H0.text: when did martial law in the philippines end. 1986

H1.text: when did martial law in the philippines end. 1987

H2.text: when did martial law in the philippines end. 1978

H3.text: when did martial law in the philippines end. 81

A4.text: Martial law was lifted by President Marcos on January 17, 1981, through Proclamation 2045.

A5.text: Marcos retained virtually all of his powers as dictator until he was ousted by the EDSA Revolution.
